```{python}
#| label: humanity-stupidity-budget
#| fig-cap: "Humanity's Budget Priorities"

import sys
sys.path.insert(0, 'c:/code/decentralized-institutes-of-health')

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np
from brain.charts._chart_style import (
    setup_chart_style, add_watermark, clean_spines,
    COLOR_RED, COLOR_BLUE, COLOR_DARK, COLOR_MID, COLOR_WHITE, COLOR_BG
)

# Setup styling
setup_chart_style(style='light', dpi=150)

# Data - values in billions for easier display
categories = [
    'Disease\nBurden',
    'War &\nConflict',
    'Direct War\nSpending',
    'Finding\nCures',
    'Cancer\nResearch',
    'Alzheimer\'s\nResearch'
]

# Values in billions
values = [
    109100,  # Disease burden: $109.1T
    9700,    # War & conflict total cost: $9.7T
    2720,    # Direct military spending: $2.72T
    68,      # Finding cures: $68B
    6.9,     # Cancer research: $6.9B
    3.7      # Alzheimer's research: $3.7B
]

# Colors - red for bad, blue for good
colors = [COLOR_RED, COLOR_RED, COLOR_RED, COLOR_BLUE, COLOR_BLUE, COLOR_BLUE]

# Create chart with logarithmic scale to show the absurdity
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(24, 12))

# Use log scale to actually see the small numbers
bars = ax.bar(categories, values, color=colors, edgecolor=COLOR_WHITE, linewidth=3, alpha=0.9)

# Log scale
ax.set_yscale('log')

# Format labels with actual dollar amounts
labels = ['$109.1T', '$9.7T', '$2.7T', '$68B', '$7B', '$4B']
for bar, label, value in zip(bars, labels, values):
    height = bar.get_height()
    ax.text(bar.get_x() + bar.get_width()/2., height,
            label, ha='center', va='bottom', fontsize=40, weight='bold', color=COLOR_DARK)

# Styling
ax.set_ylabel('Annual Spending (logarithmic scale)', fontsize=32, weight='bold', color=COLOR_DARK)
ax.tick_params(axis='x', labelsize=32, colors=COLOR_DARK)
ax.tick_params(axis='y', labelsize=28, colors=COLOR_MID)
ax.set_title('The Stupidest Budget in the Universe', fontsize=56, pad=30, weight='bold', color=COLOR_DARK)

# Add subtitle explaining the scale
ax.text(0.5, 0.95, '(Logarithmic scale - each line up is 10X larger)',
        transform=ax.transAxes, ha='center', va='top',
        fontsize=28, color=COLOR_MID, style='italic')

clean_spines(ax, ['top', 'right'])
ax.grid(True, alpha=0.3, color=COLOR_LIGHT, axis='y')

# Add branding
add_watermark(fig)

plt.savefig('assets/charts/humanity-stupidity-budget.png', dpi=150, bbox_inches=None, facecolor=COLOR_BG)
plt.show()
```
